law.catch_line: Supervision of referendum by Commissioner -- Expenses.
law.text: The manner, conduct, and management of any referendum held under KRS 247.6040 to 247.6070 shall be under the supervision and direction of the Commissioner, and all expenses in connection with the referendum shall be borne by the association conducting the referendum.
law.history: Created 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 79, sec. 13, effective June 26, 2007.
